name: TwitsSell.it
overview:
Don’t you ever got those messages in your Twitter account “I sell …” or “I am looking for …”. Wouldn’t it be nice to have a platform that brings buyers en sellers in contact with each other, and this quickly, easily, and safely?

Placing ads is a completely new experience through the use of twitsell.it:

-No complicated or time-consuming registration procedures. Simply sign in with your existing Twitter account -The simplest ad is placed in just seconds, both on Twitter and on Facebook (with the ability to upload photos or pictures via webcam, smartphone or tablet) -Ability to add additional info to your Classified which can be consulted via a shortened URL in your tweet -Device-independent: our platform works in most browsers, both on the classic devices (desktop, laptop, …) as the mobile devices (tablet, smartphone) -Allow the user to define the region and do not limit the region by the local ads websites -Platform available in multiple languages -Let your ad redistribute themselves through social media themselves (Retweet, Like it,Share It) -Your ad can be found also on our website!
